## Overview

**`r desc::desc_get_field("Title")`:** `r desc::desc_get_field("Description")`

Code adapted from [nycflights13](https://nycflights13.tidyverse.org).

Feel free to use and/or fork this project!

## Installation

You can install the development version of mspflights from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("jabenninghoff/mspflights")
```

Or using renv:

``` r
# install.packages("renv")
renv::install("jabenninghoff/mspflights")
```
